item.description:
Welcome the dynamic couple, Matt Monarch and Angela Stokes-Monarch. They'll share with us their amazing stories and have some unique products and books available, as well.

Matt Monarch, author of ‘Raw Spirit’ & 'Raw Success' and Raw Food Educator has been eating 100% raw for nearly 10 years now. You can learn more about him at www.rawsuccess.org.

In this talk he discusses:
# Is the Raw Food Diet for you?
# Overcoming Health Challenges
# Why some diets work and some don’t
# Difficulties that may arise on your journey
# Benefits of eating Raw Foods, juicing and colonics

Angela Stokes lost over 150lbs and overcame morbid obesity with a raw food lifestyle. She runs www.rawreform.com and is visiting from the UK to share her message of natural recovery.

She speaks about:
# Healthy, rapid weight loss
# How to break overeating patterns
# Balancing detox with slimming
# Taking care of the body naturally
# Addressing the underlying issues

$15
For More Information and R.S.V.P. Contact:
aimeeslivinmagic@gmail.com

Monthly Potlucks: Each third Saturday, we host a raw food potluck at our home at 254 Cider Hill Rd., York, ME, at 5 pm until we’re tired of laughing and talking. All are welcome. Just bring a raw dish to share, a salad or some fruit. We prefer organic, if possible. Be prepared to have the best time ever!

We hope you can join us for all of these amazing events. And don't forget to visit us online at aimeeslivinmagic.com.

All our love,
Aimee and Denny Perrin
Aimee's Livin' Magic
254 Cider Hill Road
York, ME 03909
www.aimeeslivinmagic.com
www.longevitychallenge.com
item.name: Aimee's Potluck w. Matt & Angela Stokes - Monarch
